name: Scallion Soup
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, soups and stews
keywords: appetizer, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, scallion
recipeIngredient: 1 pound scallions (about 4 bunches or 24 scallions), trimmed and cut across into 1-inch lengths
3 1/2 cups vegetarian broth (see Micro Tips) or canned chicken broth

recipeInstructions.text: Combine scallions with 1 cup of the broth in a 2 1/2-quart souffle dish or casserole with a lid. Cover tightly with microwave plastic wrap or with lid. Cook at 100 percent power for 12 minutes in a 650- to 700-watt oven. If using plastic, prick to release steam.

Remove from oven and uncover. Pour mixture into a food processor and puree. Pour back into souffle dish. Dissolve cornstarch in remaining broth and add to scallion mixture. Cover and cook for 8 minutes. If using plastic, prick to release steam.
Remove from oven. Uncover, stir in salt and pepper and serve.
